game_description: Interactive platform for multisensory stimulation therapies and behavioral therapies based on Virtual Reality with total immersion. It is a support tool for neuropsychological intervention whose ultimate goal is, through spontaneous interaction with immersive multisensory environments, to reduce anxiety states and behavioral disorders, promote self-control and concentration, as well as develop creative abilities. GRADIOR Multisensorial works on the sensory and psycho-affective dimension of people, contributing to improve their quality of life.
Developer: I Mas D Y Empleo Serviconsulting Sl
review_1: Im not sure we know what Multisensorial Gradiors are yet, but I liked the introductory enviornment and overall build quality on display.
